name: Little Lamper
blurb: Fly with Lil Lamper and his friends through dangerous environments to help them find a way home!

rewards.reward: Early Worm\r\n==============================\r\nA personalized digital thank you on our website and our deepest gratitude

Early Bird\r\n==============================\r\nBe an Alpha Player! You get the previous tier, access to the alpha version of the game in mid May, and high-res desktop wallpapers that are created exclusively for Backers!

Artist\r\n==============================\r\nBackers Receive the Early Bird tier, and a digital art book including behind the scenes concepts of the character, model break downs, and screen shots of the development stages of the game.

Princess Button-Up!\r\n==============================\r\nShow everyone that you rule! The Princess Button-Up! tier gives you the rewards from the Artist tier, a set of 6 buttons and 1 key-chain of the Princess concepts.

Professor Button-Up!\r\n==============================\r\nBe the brains behind the operation. The Professor Button-Up! tier gives you the\t rewards from the Artist tier, a set of 6 buttons and 1 key-chain of the Professor concepts.

Ninja Button-Up!\r\n==============================\r\nStrike fear into the hearts of spiders everywhere. The Ninja Button-Up! tier gives you the rewards from the Artist tier, a set of 6 buttons and 1 key-chain of the Ninja concepts.

Pirate Button-Up!\r\n==============================\r\nArrr!!! Avast ye sky-lubbers! The Pirate Button-Up! tier gives you the rewards from the Artist tier, a set of 6 buttons and 1 key-chain of the Pirate concepts.

The Enthusiast\r\n==============================\r\nLike all of them? Want to be smart, sophisticated, deadly, and out for the loot? Look no further, this is your tier. You get the rewards from the Artist tier, a set of 8 buttons (2 of each of the characters) and 2 11"x17" posters to hang on your walls, whether in your tower, office, dojo, or captain's quarters.

The Entomologist\r\n==============================\r\nSeriously like bugs? Seriously into collecting? Seriously sick of seriousness? With this tier, you'll get all character buttons (24 in total), all character key-chains (4 in total), 2 11"x17" posters and the rewards from the Artist tier.

The Bugged Out Bundle 

==============================
Want to know what you'd look like as a Lamper, but not up for fighting the Spiders? Get 'Lamped' with this bundle! With a photo of yourself (or if you want it as a gift, a photo of someone), we will make you into a Lamper to express your personality, likes and dislikes, style, etc. You will receive 10 buttons, 5 key-chains, and 2 11"x17" posters of your Lamper, plus the Entomologist tier.

The Love-Bug Bundle

==============================
What could be more romantic than a night meeting and bringing your own light? With a photo of yourself and a partner, we will make both of you into Lampers in a shared picture! You will receive 10 buttons, 5 key-chains, and 2 11"x17" posters of your Lampers, plus the Entomologist tier.

Name It: Princess\r\n============================== \r\nYou've always been elegant, radiant, and destined for greatness. This name will be used in all official materials for the Princess, your name will be listed in the credits as a Lord or Lady-In-Waiting, and you'll receive the rewards from the Entomologist tier.

Name It: Professor\r\n============================== \r\nYou like academic books over fiction, and will argue for days the difference between Lampyridae and Elateridae. This name will be used in all official materials for the Professor, your name will be listed in the credits as a Teacher Assistant and you'll receive the rewards from the Entomologist tier.

Name It: Ninja\r\n============================== \r\nYou are darkness. You are silence. You fight for what you believe in. This name will be used in all official materials for the Ninja, your name will be listed in the credits as a Sensei and you'll receive the rewards from the Entomologist tier.

Name It: Pirate\r\n============================== \r\nSo... Captain sounds pretty good, doesn't it? This name will be used in all official materials for the Pirate, your name will be listed in the credits as a Captain and you'll receive the rewards from the Entomologist tier.

Name It: Lil Lamper 
==============================

Cute, always happy even when facing terrifying obstacles and over-whelming dangers, calm in the face of absolute horror, this is the little guy that started it all.

This name will be used in all official materials for the Lil Lamper, your name will be listed in the credits as a Lamper and you'll receive the rewards from the Entomologist tier.

Name It: Spider\r\n============================== \r\nYou will be the terror that strikes deep in the heart of all Lampers, the name whispered to keep little Lampers inside after dark, what Lampers look for under their beds...  This name will be used in all official materials for the Spider, your name will be listed in the credits as a Spider Wrangler and you'll receive the rewards from the Entomologist tier.

Creator\r\n ==============================\r\nThink you could do better dodging obstacles and spiders, flying through unknown realms? Want to try? With this tier, the Little Lamper team will work with you in designing a fully playable Lamper, with your choice of name. For eternal glory, your name will also be in the credits as a Creator and you'll receive the rewards from the Bugged Out Bundle.
